page.title: 02WARWICK BRIDGE SCHOOL
page.content: This County Primary School has about 200 pupils of both sexes.They can start to attend when they are four years old and transfer to Secondary School, usually William Howard Comprehensive Brampton,when they are 11. At 09.00 the day starts with registration. Basic subjects,Maths and Language work,take up the morning.Lunch is 12.00 to 13.15,most pupils buy a school snack lunch costing(1985)50p a day,while others bring a packed lunch.The afternoon session could include Science, Art/Craft,a history or geography Topic or Project,Music,PE,etc.The pupils go home at 15.45. There is a 15minute break morning and afternoon. Teaching staff are four male and four female.
